recipe.title: Savory Oatmeal with a Basted Egg
ingredients: 2 tablespoons shredded Emmentaler or Gruyère cheese
instructions: » In a small saucepan, bring 1 1/2 cups of water with a pinch of salt to a boil and stream in the oats. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until the oats are soft, 30 to 45 minutes. Baste the egg while the oats are cooking.
» Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the olive oil and cheese. Top with the egg and season to taste with salt and pepper. Eat immediately.
